ca.mcgill.ecse211.finalproject

Class Localizer

  • java.lang.Object
    • ca.mcgill.ecse211.finalproject.Localizer

  • public class Localizer
extends java.lang.Object
    Handles the localization of the robot, manages both the ultrasonic and light localizers.
    Author:
    Justin Tremblay

    • Constructor Detail

      • Localizer

        public Localizer(UltrasonicLocalizer ul,
         LightLocalizer ll,
         Driver dr)
        Constructor
        Parameters:
        ul - UltrasonicLocalizer, performs rising or falling edge localization to determine the robot's heading
        ll - LightLocalization, works alongside the ultrasonic localizer to determine the robot's position with respect to a reference position.
        dr - Driver, handles moving the robot.
